document.masterDocTitle: The orb-weaving spider genus Eustala Simon, 1895 (Araneae, Araneidae): eight new species, redescriptions, and new records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The orb-weaving spider genus Eustala Simon, 1895 (Araneae, Araneidae): eight new species, redescriptions, and new records

bibRefCitation.author: Mello-Leitao
bibRefCitation.refString: Mello-Leitao, C. de. (1947) Aranhas do Parana e Santa Catarina, das colecoes do Museu Paranaense. Arquivos do Museu Paranaense, 6 (6), 231 - 304.

figureCitation.captionText: FIGURE 88 – 90. Records of the Eustala species. 88, Eustala albiventer (Keyserling, 1884) and E. minuscula (Keyserling, 1892). 89, Eustala taquara (Keyserling, 1892). 90, Eustala perfida Mello-Leitão, 1947, E. levii Poeta, Marques & Buckup, 2010, E. palmares Poeta, Marques & Buckup, 2010, and E. belissima Poeta, Marques & Buckup, 2010. Scale bars, 500 km.
